item.title: Disclaimer
item.description:

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
This website does not collect any personal information unless you voluntarily provide it through forms or email.

Non-identifiable data such as browser type, device, and visit duration may be collected to improve website performance and user experience.

No data is sold, rented, or shared with third parties.
If you contact the author, your email will be used only to reply to your query.

This policy may be updated periodically without prior notice.
